attributes.action: put pressure on Ian Brown and John Squire to make up and reform The Stone Roses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I saw Ian Brown at the Southampton Guildhall, and i thought its really unfair that the they wont make up and get back together so i'm petitioning that the Prime Minister forces them to get back together.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
